Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Ovarian, Fallopian Tube, and Peritoneal Cancer Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS), Tumor
Purpose: To identify genetic variants in ovarian, fallopian tube, and peritoneal tumors for diagnosis, prognosis, and therapeutic management.
Container: Not specified (typically a sterile container or FFPE block for tumor tissue)
Equipment: Qubit fluorometer, NanoDrop spectrophotometer, sonicator, thermal cycler, Illumina sequencer, bioanalyzer
